title: iTuvaNTi samayAna
sahitya:
iTuvaNTi samayAna inta tAmasamaitE eTu tALu kondunayyA


anupallavi

  vaTapatra shayana nA vesaTanu tolaginci diTavu ceppanu mAku dikkevvaru krSNa


caraNam 1    entani sairintu vivrintu intintayani balka evari taramu santatamu 
I bAdha sairimpa lEka ninu cintinci ikanAtu cEbaTTumani vETa
    caraNam 2    karagi karagi nE kannIru rAlcaga karuNimpa kunnAvu kamala nAbhA 
karivarada iTuvaNTi kaTina cittuDani nE neruga kanu goliciti IvaradAka krSNa
    caraNam 3    bhUsurulu ninu cAla pogaDaga vini nE nI sharaNu jocciti neneru mIraganu 
shrIsha gOpAladAsuni veta dIrcci bhAsurambuga nAtO palugakanu krSNa
